Important Dates

Please note the following important deadlines for ACM SIGGRAPH VRCAI 2025.

September 10, 2025 Abstract Submission Deadline (Optional)
October 08, 2025 Full/Short Paper Submission Deadline
October 08, 2025 Poster/Demo Submission Deadline
November 08, 2025 Notification of Paper Results
November 20, 2025 Camera-Ready Paper Submission Deadline
December 10-12, 2025 Conference Dates

Note: All deadlines are at 23:59 Beijing Time (UTC+8).

Submission Reminders

To ensure your paper is successfully submitted, please prepare all materials in advance and complete your submission before the deadline. The system may slow down due to high submission volume in the days leading up to the deadline, so early submission is recommended.

All submitted papers will undergo a peer review process. Please ensure your paper complies with the formatting requirements and submission guidelines for ACM SIGGRAPH VRCAI 2025.
